directions: In a medium bowl combine the chicken, soup, beans, salt and pepper; mix well and set aside. Prepare stuffing according to package directions.
Preheat oven to 375  degrees F (190 degrees C).
Spoon chicken mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish, top with prepared stuffing and sprinkle with cheese.
Bake, covered, for 25 minutes; remove cover and bake another 5 minutes to brown the cheese.
ingredients: 2 cups cooked, cubed chicken breast meat
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup
1 (12 ounce) package unseasoned dry bread stuffing mix
title: Chicken, Stuffing and Green Bean Casserole
